subject: Football
Coaches and Managers
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: A defensive savant with a fiery personality and a salty vocabulary, Mike Zimmer, 59, spent more than three decades as a college and N.F.L. assistant before becoming a first-time head coach.
snippet: A defensive savant with a fiery personality and a salty vocabulary, Mike Zimmer, 59, spent more than three decades as a college and N.F.L. assistant before becoming a first-time head coach.
